title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, June 21, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of French existentialist and writer Jean-Paul Sartre (1905), who said, “a writer should not allow himself to be turned into an institution.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of French existentialist and writer Jean-Paul Sartre (1905), who said, “a writer should not allow himself to be turned into an institution.”
